file_content.text: Your victory means nothing. The damage has been done. The proof has been transmitted.
So, deal the deathblow, Sith. I am at peace knowing that the greater good has been served.
I hate to burst your bubble, Jedi. No, that's a lie, I'm reveling in it. I intercepted your transmission. The Jedi know nothing.
Your failure is complete. How do you feel now?
That must hurt, Jedi.
You just earned your pay, Lieutenant.
Well done.
Quinn, I could kiss you.
[Flirt] My hero.
I'm only doing my job, my lord.
That was too close for comfort, Imperial.
You almost blew it.
I had her monitored and screened the entire time. There was never any risk at all.
Gloat all you like, it means nothing. I remain at peace. And Nomen Karr and his Padawan will still defeat you.
They will fall just as you have fallen.
I will destroy them.
I face my end knowing what is true.
Tell me the name of Nomen Karr's Padawan.
Who is she?
I will never betray her identity.
I'm impressed with your fortitude, Jedi.
You are tireless.
The Force and the Jedi way give me a sense of something larger than myself.
I am resigned. Strike me down, I offer no further resistance.
With pleasure. [Kill her]
You are subdued. There's no sense in destroying you.
Killing you would be a waste.
I will take the wounded Jedi into custody, my lord.
Your lightsaber, if you will, Jedi. Men, escort her to her new home in the main prison.
I'm sure you know what you're doing, my lord. But sparing the Jedi is a curious choice.
I don't need to explain myself to you.
Mind your business.
A Jedi investigator will be a wealth of information.
She could be useful.
It is beyond your understanding, Imperial.
It's over your head.
Of course, my lord. What matters is the threat has been averted.
I'm not going to object if you want to die.
If you insist. [Kill her]
There is no death, there is the Force.
How bizarre. She just closed her eyes and accepted death.
Bizarre indeed.
Very curious.
Sheer idiocy.
Stupid.
It almost took the fun out of killing her.
She tried to ruin the moment.
No matter. The threat is ended.
Lord Baras will be anxious to learn what became of this. When you're ready, I'll contact him from my office.
On my way.
I'm anxious to get off this planet.
Good. Then I'll be done here.
Excellent. I'll go prepare.
The old man can wait.
No hurry.
Of course, my lord, take your time. I'm not seeking to impose.
I'll be waiting in my barracks.
You're too late, Sith. I already transmitted the conversation between you and Commander Rylon to the Jedi Council. Nomen Karr has his proof.
Now Master Karr and his Padawan will track down and expose every Sith agent in the galaxy.
Jaesa Willsaam was right about Rylon and her power is verified. Now she and her Master Nomen Karr will root out every Sith operative in the galaxy.
You won't be around to see it.
Without you.
I will not fall today. Not to you. My intentions and motivations are clear. As is my mind.
I'll let you enjoy your delusions.
Keep dreaming.
Enjoyment is not part of the equation.
Mark my words, they will be hunted every step of the way.
I'll make it hard for them.
You fight for a losing cause, Sith.
I have purity of purpose. I seek neither thrills nor satisfaction. Unlike you, I am calm.
How incredibly boring.
Sounds dull.
Living an enlightened life is anything but boring.
You know nothing about me.
You presume too much.
I know that by the shortcuts you have taken, your strength is thin.
Unlike me, you're about to be dead.
Only one of us will walk away.
If you persist in this aggression, I shall be forced to strike you down.
The dark side shall fail you, Sith.
Save yourself. Surrender, and the Jedi Council will give you every opportunity to discover redemption.
I would rather be dead.
Never. [Attack]
Attack me and you will be.
I offer you the chance to surrender, and live, Jedi.
Lay down your lightsaber.
Surrender is not possible. I am in the right.
I won't kill you, Sith. But I am leaving. So, I'm going to have to incapacitate you.
Save your breath, Jedi, you're going to need it.
Shut up and fight. [Attack]
Attack me and I will kill you.
